Name: Ursa
About the game: Welcome to Ursa! You have been contracted by a mining company to finish setting up some positional beacons on the surface of the planet. You will be provided a standard issue anti-gravity gun to help navigate the difficult terrain of Ursa. Also be sure to watch out for any hidden collectibles along the way! Features Open World (you can walk all the way around the world) Competitive Leaderboards Hidden Collectibles Achievements
Meta Title: Ursa: Dec 24, 2020, Patrick Sweeney and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Ursa? Check out the release date (Dec 24, 2020), developer insights from Patrick Sweeney, and a complete game summary.
